title: Seychelles launches Miss Creole des iles internationalTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Seychelles launches Miss Creole des iles international Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
The scene is set for Seychelles for the soft launching of first edition of Miss Creole des Iles International set October 10 th , during the Creole month. This year’s 30 th edition of Festival Kreol is dedicating the month of October as the Creole month, with the main events starting on October 24 th , the day the Kreol Festival will be officially opened. Conceived by Telly’s Modelling agency, Miss Creole des iles International is open for young ladies aged 18-30 years and natives of a Kreol speaking Island.
The pageant is set to create a platform for young people to promote Creole culture, dance, food & folklore as well as tourism-culture activities in Creole speaking countries. Since the launching of the pageant earlier this month, five candidates have already shown interest. The target is to achieve a maximum of ten ladies who will contest in the grand finale. Telly’s Modelling agency said the pageant on October 10 th will be a soft-launching of Miss Creole des Iles International.
Whilst the secretariat of Miss Creole des iles International will be based in Seychelles, Telly’s Modelling agency is anticipating that each Creole speaking country will organise their Miss Creole pageant on a national level with the winners meeting in Seychelles for the Grand Final of Miss Creole des Iles International. There is also plan to rotate the organisation of Miss Creole des Iles International among Creole Speaking countries. Executive Producer Telly’s agencyTerry Carolla, said “Our aim is to make the pageant a renown international one which will attract potential, international media for broadcasting around the world, thus creating another cultural tourism attraction for the Seychelles, and most importantly to provide a platform for the develop of our young ladies, building their self-confidence and self esteem”
Telly’s Modelling agency said the reigning Miss Creole des iles International will work with the secretariat to implement an educational program in their respective countries to bring to the fore the full spectrum of Creole tradition, such as music, language and become an ambassador for culture and tourism among the younger generation.
Seychelles has ventured into the Miss Creole pageant in the past when it was held in 1994, 1996 and 2010; this pageant had t left interesting chapters in organisation of this event. With Creole des iles International, Telly’s Agency looks to bring this event to new heights and give it an international status.
The closing date for registration of Miss Creole des iles is 30 th August 2015.
Source:- Seychelles Tourism
